title: 2019 AP PARLIAMENT ELECTIONS
desc:
Party wise seats
nopartySeatscolor
1YSRCP22
2TDP3
General Elections were held in Andhra Pradesh on 11 April 2019 to elect representatives for 17th Lok Sabha
